In this update, we added access to our blog under News. The Guitar Tricks blog has tons of tips and advice for every guitar player. We also fixed some design bugs found on the iPad. We hope you enjoy this update! Love the app? Please rate us!

In this update, we added a search feature so you can easily sort though song lessons. We hope you enjoy this update! Love the app? Please rate us!

Minor update.

Thanks for learning with Guitar Tricks! Please rate us in the app store if you're playing guitar now!

We hope you'll enjoy our brand new design with additional features including:

- Recent and Newest Lessons Queue
- Collections For Every Music Taste
- New Progress System
- New Acoustic Course
- Improved Filter and Search Features
- Light and Dark Mode Layout
- Artist Page
- Fixes to Minor Bugs

As always, we appreciate your feedback in the App Store if you're enjoying your guitar learning experience!
